question: "Nicoya" is one of the five blue zones of the world. In which nation Nicoya is located?
explanation: Nicoya, one of the five blue zones in the world, is a city located in the Nicoya Peninsula of Costa Rica. Blue Zones are the regions of the world, according to Dan Buettner, where people live much longer than the average. He identified five regions as "Ble Zones of the World" which are Nicoya (Costa Rica); Okinawa (Japan); Sardinia (Italy); Icaria (Greece); Loma Linda (California, United States of America).
